# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is truly a game-changer in its category. It's designed to enhance your daily life with its innovative features and unparalleled performance. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $80. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I am extending an exclusive offer to you today. For a limited time only, you can acquire this product for $75. This is an excellent chance to experience the benefits firsthand without breaking the bank. Don't miss out on this special deal! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
